item.title: Dumped rubbish, 22nd June
item.description:

item.title: Road sign obscured by overgrown weeds, 22nd June
item.description:
Road sign into Battery Road not visible as weeds are overgrowing around it. The ground area at the base of road sign and around is covered with litter for over 3 months - litter clearing being missed along this part of road. Smashed glass bottle close by.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Battery Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees grown too tall and overhanging into our garden, 22nd June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 174, Venner Road, Penge, London

item.title: Priory gardens - middle park, flooded., 22nd June
item.description:
The middle of the park, next to large pond is almost entirety flooded, has been for weeks. Only one of the benches is now accessible. A stream has been formed in middle, flowing to adjacent small pond. What is council doing about this? How much longer will it take to be resolved? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No entry sign warning removed., 22nd June
item.description:
There was a no entry sign on the corner of Cureton St and Causton St but it disappeared when a street lamp was taken away. The sign needs to be reinstated to warn drivers there's no access through to Vauxhall Bridge Road. Quite often vehicles, especially large transport like buses & lorries have to do a 3-point turn to head back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Causton Street, Millbank, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council owned tree needs pruning, 22nd June
item.description:
As per the image, this tree on the council highway is obstructing the bus stop sign and preventing people from reading the information/locating the bus stop. Please trim the tree branches to stop them covering the bus stop information and striking passing buses.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowes Road, New Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet
